headline: Sam Michel appointed as BDM for UK automotive at Assurant
summary: Sam Michel has been appointed to the role of business development manager at the UK automotive division of Assurant, a global business services company. He will be responsible for identifying and creating sustainable and successful commercial partnerships within the UK’s leading automotive retailers across both franchise dealers and car supermarkets, based around Assurant’s suite of vehicle…
